sources.title: The Mysterious Airman (1928) SILENTüçï10-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 10-Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Walter Miller, Eugenia Gilbert, Dorothy Tallcot
Directors: Harry Revier

Since acquiring the exclusive rights to an aeronautical innovation, Baker Aircraft has become the envy of its rivals but also the target of a deadly masked pilot known only as ‚ÄúX.‚Äù Owner Jeff Baker and his aviatrix fiancee find themselves in constant peril on land and above the clouds but vow to bring The Mysterious Airman down to Earth.

TRIVIA: This thrilling, death-defying Chapter Play was thought to be lost for decades until Kit Parker Films and SabuCat Productions combined forces to rescue the sole surviving 35mm print for a Hi-definition restoration. 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00         PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:55         CHAPTER 1:  The Air Raid
17:53       CHAPTER 2:  The Girl Who Flew Alone
37:14       CHAPTER 3:  Flaming Wings
55:07       CHAPTER 4:  The Flying Torpedo
1:15:06    CHAPTER 5:  The Air Pirate
1:34:47    CHAPTER 6:  The Hawk's Nest
1:56:09    CHAPTER 7:  A Leap For Life
2:14:11    CHAPTER 8:  The Winged Avenger   
2:33:47    CHAPTER 9:  The Warning From The Sky 
2:45:11    CHAPTER 10:  The Air Battle
3:06:48    Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: An inventor adds new innovations to Baker Airplane Company's planes, inventions coveted by the owners of a rival company. The masked and mysterious airman, known only as Pilot X, makes plans to steal the inventions for his own purposes. The perils are fast and furious as the owner of the airplane company, aided by his aviatrix fiancee, find themselves in constant danger, both on land and in the air.
metadata.Actors: Walter Miller, Eugenia Gilbert, Robert Walker
